TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit MsmqException extends System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException

summary.span: 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 所傳回的封裝錯誤。

span.span: Encapsulates errors returned by Message Queuing (MSMQ).

summary.span: 這個例外狀況是由訊息佇列傳輸和訊息佇列整合通道所擲回。

span.span: This exception is thrown by the Message Queuing transport and the Message Queuing integration channel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當訊息佇列通道與訊息佇列互動時，可能會擲回這個例外狀況，其中包括開啟佇列、查詢佇列的資訊、傳送訊息及接收訊息。This exception can be thrown when the Message Queuing channel interacts with a message queue, including opening a queue, querying a queue for information, sending messages, and receiving messages. 包含訊息佇列錯誤碼的例外狀況。The exception contains the Message Queuing error code. 一般而言，當架構無法自動從錯誤中復原，需要人為操作時，便會擲回此例外狀況。Typically, this exception is thrown when the framework cannot recover from the error automatically and requires some human intervention. 例如，若沒有安裝訊息佇列，而試圖開啟訊息佇列傳輸接聽程式時，便會擲回此例外狀況。For example, this exception will be thrown if Message Queuing is not installed and an attempt is made to open the Message Queuing transport listener.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
